long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to quickly insert predefined comments into LinkedIn posts. It streamlines the process of commenting by providing a dynamic selection of responses, helping you engage in conversations more efficiently. Perfect for professionals looking to contribute thoughtful comments with just a few clicks.
